reviews.title: Great Late Night Eats
reviews.text: This is a friendly place. The pub is located in the basement. They are open late and the menu has a varied selection. But, I like their hamburgers. The fries are usually fresh and crisp. This place is great for a late night meal after going to the movies.

reviews.title: Town Staple
reviews.text: Solid pub food and warm cozy atmosphere. I love to sip a cold one next to the fireplace.

reviews.title: Quiet place for 30+ crowd
reviews.text: Excellent service, drinks & décor. Perfect for after dinner drinks or after a movie.

reviews.title: Pub grub with great variety
reviews.text: With so many choices, this is a great place to get a burger, chicken, salad and a beer or other drink. Nothing fancy, great outdoor seating in the warm weather. Entrees are a bit pricey however seem well portioned and enjoyed by others around us.

reviews.title: Fun Place to Go With a Group of Friends
reviews.text: Good choices on local beer as well

reviews.title: Great atmosphere and experience in Cranford- good bar scene as well
reviews.text: I've been here a few times for drinks but this was my first time sitting in the outdoor cafe. Great service and good food. Fresh fried calamari was excellent- so was the seared yellowfin tuna salad. Bob the manager was also very hospitable and came around to check up to make sure everything was going well. I'd recommend this place for a night out in Cranford.... - Lee
